attributes.action: Accept that cannabis is safer than alcohol.
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis less toxic than alcohol- http://goo.gl/qZI9zG
Cannabis is less addictive than alcohol- http://goo.gl/XIrmZu
attributes.background: The far majority negatives of cannabis are of that we are already aware of to basic knowledge, yet, when alcohol is compared to cannabis, we find that the legal drug of alcohol is more addictive than cannabis. Alcohol is also the leading cause of multiple caners and leads to abusive behaviour.

rejection.details:
We not sure what action you are asking the UK Government or Parliament to take in this case.

If you would like alcohol and cannabis to be treated equally in law, you may find that there is a petition already about this on our site.
